#summary NVIDIA Texture Tools Roadmap

Here's a rough roadmap for the next releases of the NVIDIA Texture Tools:

= 2.1 =

Completed features:
 * ~~Support for linear color transforms and swizzles: [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=4 Issue 4]~~
 * ~~Higher quality DXT3 compressor: [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=38 Issue 38]~~
 * ~~Migration to CUDA 2.0: [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=46 Issue 46]~~
 * ~~Support for alpha premultiplication. [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=30 Issue 30]~~
 * ~~Output AMD swizzle codes in DDS headers.~~

In progress:

 * Major refactoring and cleanup.
 * Support for different alpha modes: [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=30 Issue 30]
 * Support for floating point formats: [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=27 Issue 27]
 * Support for YCoCg color transform: [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=18 Issue 18]

Optional features:

 * DXT1n support: [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=21 Issue 21]
 * CTX1 support: [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=21 Issue 21]
 * Add option to disable single color compressor: [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=53 Issue 53]
 * Image viewer (nvdisplay): [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=53 Issue 53]


= 2.2 =

Planned features:

 * More CUDA accelerated compressors and image processing operations. [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=29 Issue 29]
 * Support for DX11 compression formats.
 * RGBE output format: [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=57 Issue 57]
 * Simple tone mapping options: [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=58 Issue 58]
 * Better support for DX10 style DDS files: [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=41 Issue 41]

Optional features:

 * Win64 image loaders: [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=31 Issue 31]
 * Better command line parsing and more command line options.
 * Experimental lower level interface.


= 2.3 =

Planned features:
 
 * Use CUDA driver interface: [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=25 Issue 25]
 * Photoshop plugin: [http://code.google.com/p/nvidia-texture-tools/issues/detail?id=33 Issue 33]
